channel.title: Comments on: About
channel.description: See Berlin through a lens of migration and difference

item.title: By: polyglott ist cool
item.dc:creator: polyglott ist cool
item.description: Absolutely wonderful website by two amazing word citizens. Bravo. The world needs more of you. tb
item.content:encoded:
Absolutely wonderful website by two amazing word citizens. Bravo. The world needs more of you.
tb

item.title: By: Nicole Calian
item.dc:creator: Nicole Calian
item.description:
Hello Kelly:
This is Nicole Calian from the UW. Would you mind sending me your email address so that I could send you an email directly to you? I am coming to Berlin in a few days and will be leading a class in Berlin for UW students. We would love to have you share your experiences with the students and possibly set up a "Referenten Vortrag". We would certainly pay you for your services as well, if you are interested.
Hope to hear back from you. Thanks, Nicole
item.content:encoded:
Hello Kelly:

This is Nicole Calian from the UW. Would you mind sending me your email address so that I could send you an email directly to you?
I am coming to Berlin in a few days and will be leading a class in Berlin for UW students. We would love to have you share your experiences with the students and possibly set up a “Referenten Vortrag”. We would certainly pay you for your services as well, if you are interested.

Hope to hear back from you.
Thanks,
Nicole

item.title: By: claudia
item.dc:creator: claudia
item.description: Cosmopolitanism. I almost cried when I read this word. It is my only belief. Thanks for sharing the same view of the world
item.content:encoded:
Cosmopolitanism. I almost cried when I read this word. It is my only belief.
Thanks for sharing the same view of the world
